questions: Q. 1. Name the news paper started by Bal Gangadhar Tilak in India in the 19th century.
answers: Ans. ‘Kesari’ was the news paper started by the Bal Gangadhar Tilak in India during 19th century. 1

questions: Q. 2. What did political leaders and reformers like Jyotiba Phule, Gandhiji, B.R. Ambedker and Periyar Ramaswamy oppose ? [Board Term-I, Term-I, Set-C5JWEVD, 2015]
answers: Ans. Discrimination against the outcaste groups, caste inequalities.

questions: Q. 3. Who wrote the autobiography ‘Amar Jiban’ published in 1876 ?
Q. 4. When did the first printing press come to India
answers: Ans. In the middle of the 16th century.
